body:
> The problem with this approach is that the .rad file which is generated by
> obj2rad does not appear the same as those that i have used before.


Is it possible that you have been using the 3ds import before, not obj? 
There are 3ds2mgf mgf2rad, which allow import of 3ds files into radiance 
(there is also a combined script around somewhere, search the archives). 
3ds2mgf used to try a material conversion, so you got valid rad-files 
even without editing material definitions.


CU Lars.
___
